tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Eritrea boasts a rich cultural heritage, with diverse ethnic groups, unique traditional clothing, vibrant music, and a strong emphasis on family and community.

tidbits.title: Unique Architecture
tidbits.description: The country showcases unique architecture, especially in Asmara, with well-preserved modernist and art deco buildings, recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

tidbits.title: Scenic Landscapes
tidbits.description: Eritrea features diverse landscapes, from the rugged beauty of the Danakil Depression to the stunning coastlines along the Red Sea.
